fees.description: You may be charged a 0.32% merchant service fee for paying by Visa or Mastercard (unless you pay via direct debit)
A $2.20 (inc. GST) charge will apply to paper bills sent in the post.

gasContract.terms: For further details on the information presented in this Plan Information Document, or for full terms and conditions, please visit www.engie.com.au or call ENGIE on 13 88 08.

discounts.description: You'll receive a 6% guaranteed discount off our gas usage and supply charges.

gasContract.variation: We may vary your rates and charges at any time, including if any underlying information is incorrect, you get a new meter or your distributor changes your tariff. We'll give you advance notice of any change, which may be on your bill.

incentives.eligibility: You'll receive an upfront bonus of 5,000 Velocity Points, and then you'll receive 2 Velocity Points for every $1 you pay for gas.

eligibility.information: Available to linked Virgin Australia Business Flyer members accounts, subject to T&Cs and your consent to your personal information being handled by ENGIE and the Virgin Australia Group.

gasContract.onExpiryDescription: Ongoing energy plan until you or we end it. We may end this energy plan at any time by giving you 20 Business Days' notice.
